text: Malik Alaudin Khan, son of Raja Nahar Khan, was the Jagirdar of Tijara. He was a Khanzada Rajput. In 1402, his father Nahar Khan was killed in an ambush for embracing Islam by Raja Thakur Jhamo Singh of Kishangarh. Alaudin Khan avenged his father by killing his maternal relative Jhamo Singh in the same year. == References == * https://archive.org/stream/gazetteerofulwur00powliala#page/40/mode/2up * * Category:Mewat Category:Indian Muslims Category:Year of birth unknown Category:People from Tijara Category:Year of death unknown
title: Malik Alaudin Khan
